title: About Seasonal Rewards...

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Will we be getting all the honor wards below our honor rank?
The purple one looks damn nice but (unfortunately...?) I'm an honor 5 player.
If we don't get all of the honor wards below our honor rank; I might have to demote to honor 4 >.>

replies.body: At the moment, it seems like we'll only be getting the ward related to our current rank. I'm not entirely sure if this will change or not, but you guys have definitely been vocal about how much this means and we're taking that to heart for sure!
